com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Class RendererBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme.RendererBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClearTheme.ComponentRenderer, DoctorSwagRainbowTheme.ComponentRenderer, GameSenseTheme.ComponentRenderer

    public abstract class RendererBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
    Base class for constructing renderers.
